name: M.G.T.
summary: Magnetik Tank is an isometric view action game released on multiple home computers.

name: MGG: Manic Game Girl
summary:
Manic Game Girl is an action-adventure RPG with 3D brawler mechanics created with the help of Han Jong Lee, one of the main programmers on Parasite Eve and part of the engine development team for Final Fantasy 8.

"The first self-developed PlayStation game in Korea."

The games development was started in 1999 and was originally planned for the Dreamcast but later switched to the PlayStation. There was trouble with the games development as the market for video games was just starting in South Korea which lead to a lack of people with experience making games at the time.

The game was released at the end of the PlayStation's production cycle after the launch of the PlayStation 2 earlier in the year. This was reflected in it's marketing at the time which mentions how it will run just as well on the newer system.

There were plans to release the game internationally by the end of the year with the North American publisher Conspiracy Entertainment but that was eventually canceled.

name: MGA's Pocket LCD Games: All-Pro Football
MGP Manager
summary: MGP Manager is a Motogp themed management simulation. Take control of a GP team, and sign riders & staff and upgrade machines to try to win the riders and teams championship.

name: MGCM Combat Edition
summary: A secondary creation fighting game which you can battle with attractive characters, magical girls, and demons from "I Am Magicami". There are three basic attack buttons, A, B, and C. Elements for beginners are also substantial. Let's grab the victory with flashy magic using the "Possibility Gauge"!

name: MGCM Combat Edition: DLC Char: Kamisaman (Isana Hakari)
summary: This is "Kamisaman", an additional character of "MGCM Combat Edition". She can use either long-reaching normal moves or excellent projectiles to develop either defensive or offensive strategies. She is a hardworking girl who guides the main character and magical girls.

name: MGDC Minigame Collection
summary: The MGDC Minigame Collection is what it says on the tin: A collection of our club's previous minigames and small projects for you to enjoy. The Collection includes 19 separate titles, ranging from simulators, racing games, shooters, and more. Each game was crafted in a limited time frame by students in the Miami University Game Design club, working on enhancing the skills of members, and having fun while doing it.

name: MGM Slots Live
summary: Explore a dazzling collection of games, shows, and tournaments with your friends. No matter where you are in the world, you can get a little taste of Las Vegas by playing in one of your favorite resorts including the MGM Grand, Bellagio, Luxor, Mandalay Bay, ARIA, and more!
